name: Crew & Templates
description: Crew definitions, role assignments, and reusable task templates for efficient scheduling.

prd.problemStatement: Scheduling requires understanding crew composition, roles, and common task patterns. Reusable templates speed up recurring work assignments.
goals: Define crews with roles and skills
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to define crews so that I can assign work efficiently
As a superintendent, I want task templates so that I can quickly create recurring assignments
